assignments.description: Define the values of task to be inserted as part of this flow.

assignments.label: Set due date to inputted date

decisions.description: Checks who the task should be assigned to based on the task information settings and routes appropriately
decisions.name: Assignment_type
decisions.label: Assignment type

decisions.description: Checks if a due date was provided as an input so this can be used or otherwise calculated using the task information due date offset.
decisions.name: Due_date_provided
decisions.label: Due date provided?

decisions.description: If a task information name has been provided, then attempt to query that record.
decisions.name: Task_information_reference_provided
decisions.label: Task information reference provided?

decisions.description: Routes differently depending on the mode applicable to this request.
decisions.name: task_mode
decisions.label: Mode?

Flow.description: Takes as an input a collection of tasks to be created with the information needed to create them using task information records.

formulas.description: The turnaround time as a negative number to input into the flow that calculates a date subtracting business days.
formulas.name: turnaroundTime

Flow.label: Task | Create From Requests

loops.name: Loop_2_1_Assign_filter_output_to_task_information_variable
loops.label: Loop 2.1 | Assign filter output to task information variable

textTemplates.name: errorEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Hi guys


Sorry to be the bearer of bad news here, just got a task that didn't go so well.


What ID: {!Loop_2_Create_tasks.whatId}

Household ID: {!householdId}

Task type: {!Loop_2_Create_tasks.taskType}

Due date input: {!Loop_2_Create_tasks.dueDate}

Target start date: {!Loop_2_Create_tasks.targetStartDate}

Fault message: {!faultMessage}

 

Related advice: {!Loop_2_Create_tasks.relatedAdviceId}

Related AML&KYC: {!Loop_2_Create_tasks.relatedAmlKycId}

Related annual review: {!Loop_2_Create_tasks.relatedAnnualReviewId}

Related mortgage opportunity: {!Loop_2_Create_tasks.relatedMortgageApplicationId}

Related opportunity: {!Loop_2_Create_tasks.relatedOpportunityId}

Related provider: {!Loop_2_Create_tasks.relatedProviderId}

Good luck, enjoy!


From The Task - create from task information Flow

variables.description: The ID of the household to which this task relates.
variables.name: householdId

variables.description: If the task should be assigned to a queue, this variable will store the developer name of that queue.
variables.name: queueDeveloperName

variables.description: The task to be created as part of this flow.
variables.name: task
